publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1070 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Bright Sparks—That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Bathgate Academy young enterprise company "Brightsparks" on its success in the Scottish National Young Enterprise Scheme and wishes this team further success as the Scottish representatives in the UK finals of the competition.

S1M-1070 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Bright Sparks—That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Bathgate Academy young enterprise company "Brightsparks" on its success in the Scottish National Young Enterprise Scheme and wishes this team further success as the Scottish representatives in the UK finals of the competition.
S1M-1070 Bright Sparks (lodged on 29 June 2000) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-1070 Bright Sparks (lodged on 29 June 2000) Karen Whitefield*
S1M-1070 Bright Sparks (lodged on 29 June 2000) Mike Watson*

S1M-1070 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Bright Sparks-That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Bathgate Academy young enterprise company "Brightsparks" on its success in the Scottish National Young Enterprise Scheme and wishes this team further success as the Scottish representatives in the UK finals of the competition. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Karen Whitefield, Mike Watson, Scott Barrie*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-1070 Bright Sparks (lodged on 29 June 2000) Robin Harper*

S1M-1070 Mrs Mary Mulligan: Bright Sparks-That the Parliament offers its congratulations to the Bathgate Academy young enterprise company "Brightsparks" on its success in the Scottish National Young Enterprise Scheme and wishes this team further success as the Scottish representatives in the UK finals of the competition. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Karen Whitefield, Mike Watson, Scott Barrie, Marilyn Livingstone, Robin Harper
